complaint.description: NO SERVICE DELIVERY FROM AN INCOMPETENT VODACOM. My WiFi has been down since the 18th of October. All the people around me have full VODACOM service and I am the only one without WiFi. When you phone to get feedback you are told repeatedly that they are escalating the issue. This after my issue was only escalated a week ago after being down for 2 weeks. To date no technician has been assigned despite it being reported daily for 3 weeks. Giving Vodacom 1 star is actually 100% overrated but I can’t post zero stars for service delivery. The messages I post on here is answered by a bot and are standard. Someone will be contacting you and then nothing happens at all.
complaint.suggestion: Assign a technician to resolve the WiFi issue promptly and improve customer service by ensuring effective communication and follow-up.

meta.review_title: NO SERVICE DELIVERY FROM AN INCOMPETENT VODACOM
meta.review_content:
I just got of the phone with yet another incompetent call centre operator. 

My WiFi has now been down since the 18th of October. 

All the people around me have full VODACOM service and I am the only one without WiFi.

When you phone to get feedback you are told repeatedly that they are escalating the issue. This after my issue was only escalated a week ago after being down for 2 weeks. 

To date no technician has been assigned despite it being reported daily for 3 weeks.

Giving Vodacom 1 star is actually 100% overrated but I can’t post zero stars for service delivery.

The messages I post on here is answered by a bot and are standard. 

Someone will be contacting you and then nothing happens at all.
